reviewText: I had high expectations for this DVD but found it unimaginative and superficial, and full of the same scenes of a few re-enacters marching back and forth on the same piece of ground, while the narrator drones on.  The coverage also seems dated and does not well reflect later scholarship on the decline and collapse of Rome's Imperium.  I thought that the History channel could do far better than this.  A waste of time, really.
